title: Euro.Truck.Simulator.2.v1.7.0.Update.incl.DLC-SKIDROW
description:
S  K  I  D  R  O  W
                           .the leading force.

                            proudly presents
             Euro Truck Simulator 2 v1.7.0 Update incl DLC 	


   08-11-2013......Release Date  Protection..........Steam+Custom
   Platformer.........Game Type  Disk(s)......................DOX


   RELEASE NOTES


Read changelog.txt for information on updated content!


   INSTALL NOTES


1. Unpack release
2. Run Euro.Truck.Simulator.2.v1.7.0.Update.incl.DLC.exe
3. Install
4. Copy everything from the SKIDROW folder into the game installation
5. Block the game in your firewall and mark our cracked content as
   secure/trusted in your antivirus program
6. Play the game
7. Support the companies, which software you actually enjoy!


   ADDITIONAL NOTES


This v1.7.0 setup, is actually the whole game, as the developers
updated the whole game file structure. So you basicially dont need an
previous releases - just this one to play!

Includes the follwing DLC:

Going East! DLC
Halloween Paint Jobs Pack DLC


   GREETINGS


To all friends of the family and honorable rival groups!
